title: Preparatory Committee for the United Nations Conference of Plenipotentiaries on Prevention and Punishment of Crimes against Humanity

Crimes against humanity 
 
 
 
 
 
Afghanistan, Andorra, Austria, Costa Rica, Cyprus, Denmark, Estonia, 
Finland, France, Gambia, Guatemala, Honduras, Lithuania, Luxembourg, 
Malta, Mexico, Monaco, Netherlands (Kingdom of the), Norway, Poland, 
Portugal, Romania, Sierra Leone, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, 
Switzerland, Timor-Leste, United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern 
Ireland, Uruguay, Zambia and State of Palestine: draft decision 
 
 
 
 Preparatory Committee for the United Nations Conference of 
Plenipotentiaries on Prevention and Punishment of Crimes 
against Humanity 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, recalling its resolution 79/122 of 4 December 2024, in 
which it decided, inter alia, to convene a preparatory committee for the United 
Nations Conference of Plenipotentiaries on Prevention and Punishment of Crimes 
against Humanity, to meet for two consecutive weeks, from 19 to 30 January 2026, 
and for four days, in 2027, at United Nations Headquarters in New York: 
 
(a) 
Decides that the second session of the Preparatory Committee for the 
United Nations Conference of Plenipotentiaries on Prevention and Punishment of 
Crimes against Humanity shall be held over four days, from 12 to 15 April 2027; 
 
(b) 
Also decides to include in the provisional agenda of its eighty-first session 
an item entitled “United Nations Conference of Plenipotentiaries on Prevention and 
Punishment of Crimes against Humanity”.
